name: Project: Rogue (CLOSED ALPHA)
description:
Welcome to the closed Alpha !

Project : Rogue is a 3D roguelike shooter that I'm working on as a project to learn game development. The game is still in a very early stage, the goal of this alpha is to find the improvements that will need to be made for the official release. Feedback is greatly appreciated

What's in the alpha ?

  • 13 items
  • 2 weapons
  • 1 playable character
  • 1 map
  • 1 boss
  • 4 enemies

What is planned next 

  • At least double the amount of items
  • At least 3 different characters with different weapons
  • 3 new maps
  • Higher tier enemies
  • Final boss

Known issues

  • Bad lightning
  • UI elements of the golem are oversized
  • Beholder's magic ball coming out of nowhere
  • Some values not resetting properly after dying and restarting a game (If that happens to you, just restart the game).
  • Camera clipping through the ground
  • Player can shoot after dying

Bug reports

you can report bugs either in the comment section or contact me on discord @NuttyGoat#9061

Thanks for being interested in the alpha, I hope to hear your feedback !
